sect1.title: gptfdisk-&gptfdisk-version;

sect2.title: Instalação do gptfdisk
sect2.para: The gptfdisk package comes with a rudimentary Makefile. First we update it to provide a simple build and install interface and fix the location of a header file as well fixing an issue introduced by a recent version of popt. Install gptfdisk by running the following commands:

screen.userinput:
patch -Np1 -i ../gptfdisk-&gptfdisk-version;-convenience-1.patch && sed -i 's|ncursesw/||' gptcurses.cc && sed -i 's|sbin|usr/sbin|' Makefile && sed -i '/UUID_H/s/^.*$/#if defined (_UUID_UUID_H) || defined (_UL_LIBUUID_UUID_H)/' guid.cc && sed -i "/device =/s/= \(.*\);/= strdup(\1);/" gptcl.cc &&
make

sect2.para: Para testar os resultados, emita: make test.

sect2.title: Explicações do Comando
sect2.para: patch -Np1 ...: Esse remendo modifica o arquivo Makefile, de forma que ele forneça um alvo install.
